name: EleutherAI/pile
description: The Pile, developed by EleutherAI, is a colossal, 825 GiB dataset designed for language modeling. It is a unique amalgamation of 22 smaller, top-tier datasets, making it a comprehensive and diverse text dataset. This dataset is a boon for the NLP community, offering a wealth of data for tasks such as language modeling, masked language modeling, and more.
creator: EleutherAI
keywords: language-modeling, masked-language-modeling, Diverse Text Datasets, NLP
